summary: This is an email chain from August 7, 2019, regarding a request to update a Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) report on Jeffrey Epstein. The email forwards a request for significant updates to be included in the SCN for an upcoming morning meeting cycle, indicating ongoing high-level monitoring of the Epstein case within the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is about providing an updated Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) report on him for an FBI meeting.

events.title: SCN Update Request for Epstein
events.description: An email chain requests significant updates to a Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) report on Jeffrey Epstein for an upcoming FBI meeting cycle.

events.title: Latest SCN as of July 24
events.description: Reference to the latest Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) report on Jeffrey Epstein as of July 24, 2019, which is attached to the email.

keyFacts: The FBI's Criminal Investigative Division was actively monitoring and updating a Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) report on Jeffrey Epstein as of August 7, 2019.
The request for an updated SCN was urgent, needed for 'tomorrow morning's meeting cycle', indicating high-priority, ongoing oversight.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination regarding the Epstein case, with a Deputy Assistant Director involved in the correspondence.
